description: Smart7z is a plugin for the popular archiver 7-Zip. Smart7z provides flexible settings when packing files into a .7z archive. For example, you can use different compression methods for different files: LZMA for .jpg files, WavPack2 for .wav files, PPMD for text files, and LZMA2 for any other files. This way, you can significantly improve the overall compression ratio.
summary: Smart7z provides flexible settings when packing files into a .7z archive
author: Dec Software
